I'm a 20 years old student & Freelance Designer. I love everything that has to do with Web design & 
development, Graphic design, Packaging, Industrial design and I feel a true devotion for typography.
Now i am studying for B.A. Animation and Graphic Designing.I have 2 years of experience as a freelance 
designer , but and I’m ready for visiting other countries & work for any designing company! I love working 
with people, specially if they have the same passion I have for what they do.
